snippet: Changes to the salary cap and player contracts under the new collective bargaining agreement will probably dominate the agenda, but player safety and other issues will also be discussed.
abstract: Changes to the salary cap and player contracts under the new collective bargaining agreement will probably dominate the agenda, but player safety and other issues will also be discussed.

byline.original: By JEFF Z. KLEIN and STU HACKEL

headline.main: For G.M.'s, a Shortened Meeting Schedule but Lots to Discuss
headline.print_headline: A Shortened Meeting Schedule But a Lot to Discuss for Executives
